title.text: Microsoft .NET Framework 1.0 Service Pack 3, Chinese (Simplified) Version

description.text: Microsoft .NET Framework 1.0 Service Pack 3 resolves various issues found after the initial release of Microsoft .NET Framework 1.0. These include both security- and non-security-related issues. After you install this item, you may have to restart your computer. Once you have installed this item, it cannot be removed.
